drone_diff.description: IGIS provides a one-stop service that covers the entire process of drone utilization, from equipment supply to training, shooting, A/S, and monthly subscription services.

1.lead: We provide individual systems tailored to the user's needs, and the main components are as follows.
1.body:
· DFOS Station : Drone/station remote control and integrated video/sensor data control
· DFOS Pilot : Drone flight app that intuitively controls photo/video shooting and route flight
· DFOS Viewer : Shares control screens with multiple users for simultaneous monitoring
· DFOS IMS : Automatic orthophoto production and video registration, management, and analysis system

2.lead: We carry out various projects in the public and private sectors based on drone platforms and operational technologies.
2.body: We propose customized solutions such as shooting, data processing, and system construction according to business objectives, and provide consulting throughout the entire project execution process to enhance the expertise and work capabilities of our clients.

3.body:
· We offer subscription services that allow the use of drone operation apps and web control systems on a monthly or yearly basis to reduce initial introduction costs.
· Regular updates and technical support are provided together to ensure business continuity through continuous services.

4.body:
· Based on precise drone filming, we provide various forms of data services such as database construction, video processing and analysis, orthophoto and panorama production.
· We also support the collection, refinement, and processing of data for AI training, enabling the acquisition of high-quality video data necessary for data-driven service development and research.

5.body:
· We provide drone operation training to enhance the ability to utilize equipment, apps, and control systems, with a practical curriculum that can be applied immediately in the field.
· Through technical support (A/S) by professional engineers, we help maintain a stable and efficient equipment operation environment by supporting inspection, troubleshooting, and function improvement.

gis_diff.description:
IGIS provides integrated GIS solutions that cover the entire process, from system sales, training, maintenance, data processing and analysis, and subscription services, to support spatial information-based tasks required in diverse industries.
By building customized systems that reflect the customer's work environment and industrial characteristics,
we support efficient data utilization and advanced work systems.

1.lead: We comprehensively analyze customer needs, budget, and operating environment to design and propose the most suitable GIS system.
1.body:
· Functions tailored to business purposes Providing a user experience tailored to various platforms (web, mobile, desktop)
· Integrated configuration including scalability, maintenance costs, and technical support system considering long-term operating environment
· Building a stable system based on various project experiences in the public and private sectors

2.lead: We provide practical training to ensure users can fully utilize GIS in their actual work.
2.body:
· Providing customized training from basic functions to advanced analysis
· Enhancing on-site applicability through practice based on work scenarios
· Support for troubleshooting, function improvement, regular inspection, and environment optimization by professional engineers
· Continuous management support to ensure stable system operation and improve user satisfaction

3.lead: We design GIS focused on functions needed in the field by subdividing the customer's work processes.
3.body:
· Defining screen configuration and workflow according to department and work purpose
· Optimized for various work types such as inspection, facility management, civil complaint handling, planning, and spatial analysis
· Integrated structure design considering linkage with existing systems
· High field applicability secured through UI/UX configuration tailored to actual work flow

4.lead: Based on professional GIS analysis technology, we collect, refine, and process various spatial data to provide information necessary for customer decision-making.
4.body:
· Providing specialized analysis such as time series change analysis, spatial statistics, grid analysis, viewshed analysis, and proximity analysis
· Capable of integrating and analyzing field information, facility information, drone images, and external data (public data, etc.)
· Providing analysis results as map-based visualizations to enhance intuitive understanding and policy/work utilization

5.lead: We offer a subscription service available on a monthly or annual basis to reduce the initial adoption burden.
5.body:
Includes regular updates, technical support, and server maintenance to continuously ensure the latest features and a stable operating environment.
This service model is suitable for companies with small project scales or customers who find adoption costs burdensome.

fms_diff.description:
IGIS's mobile GIS solution, FMS, can be installed on tablets and used directly in the field.
Designed around tasks with high mobility such as inspection, facility management, and civil complaint handling based on GIS, it helps quickly and accurately process work processes from preparation before field visits to field records, inspection result registration, and post-reporting.
fms_diff.description_02: IGIS FMS supports various field tasks based on geographic information, enhancing work processing speed and accuracy, and maximizing management efficiency.

1.lead: We provide a GIS-based, field-specific mobile app that allows you to intuitively grasp the on-site situation using a map-based UI and GPS location information.
1.body:
Minimize work gaps and errors by supporting a variety of scenarios, including automated inspection items, on-site photo registration, facility search, and history management, through standardized processes.
Also designed to operate reliably in both online and offline environments, enhancing flexibility and convenience in field operations.

2.lead: We provide practical training reflecting field workflows and actual usage environments to help users quickly learn the tablet-based FMS and utilize it immediately in the field.
2.body:
We ensure system stability and continuity through after-sales service by professional engineers, including troubleshooting, feature improvements, version updates, and new device setup.
We also provide training materials and standard manuals tailored to each task.

3.lead: Define the necessary functions and data for each work type, and design a mobile-centric screen layout, input methods, and workflows to maximize operational efficiency.
3.body: Configure customer-specific features such as shooting functions, location display, checklist automation, and on-site reporting templates to provide solutions optimized for actual work that can be used immediately in the field.

4.lead: We offer a subscription service available on a monthly or annual basis to reduce the initial adoption burden.
4.body:
Includes regular updates, technical support, and server maintenance to continuously ensure the latest features and a stable operating environment.
This service model is suitable for companies with small project scales or customers who find adoption costs burdensome.

rnd_diff.description:
IGIS is conducting various R&D projects and service projects centered on drone control and station technology, spatial information-based platforms, and digital twin construction capabilities.
Based on collected and refined data and field experience, we develop technologies applicable across industries, including construction, facility management, urban safety, and disaster management, aiming to achieve digital transformation outcomes for our customers.

1.lead: Strengthening R&D capabilities based on drone and station control technology and digital twin technology
1.body:
· Conducting full-cycle R&D and non-R&D projects from planning, development, demonstration, to performance management
· Participating in public, local government, and private projects focused on new technology development such as drone automation and remote control, station-based autonomous takeoff and landing, real-time video and sensor streaming
· Researching technologies that support rapid situation awareness and response with minimal personnel through automated patrol technology based on drones and stations for real-time monitoring of high-risk areas in security, traffic, and facility management
· Developing digital twin models and simulation technologies based on urban, facility, and field data for research and development in spatial data utilization areas such as digital safety management, facility management, and intelligent urban monitoring
· Producing realistic and sustainable research outcomes that meet project goals based on accumulated demonstration experience
· Operating field demonstration-centered projects based on user scenarios to secure practically applicable results

2.lead: Integrated proposal-based business implementation based on drones, GIS, and digital twins
2.body:
· We provide specialized customized proposals utilizing our own technologies (drone control systems, GIS, etc.)
· Based on control systems and data platforms currently used in the field, we analyze work objectives, environments, and terrain conditions to propose optimal drone models and station configurations
· Services based on real-time data collected using drones and stations (aerial photography, 3D modeling, real-time monitoring, orthophoto analysis, drone-based facility inspection, safety inspection)
· Digital twin construction services at the city and facility level (terrain and facility 3D model production, spatial data integration and control screen design, simulation and decision support function development)
· Integrated project proposals combining GIS, drones, and stations (establishing a unified environment from data collection to analysis, control, and reporting)
· Providing practical consulting tailored to customer objectives, budgets, and operational methods; performing integrated services considering operation, updates, and scalability rather than one-off projects

Fixed type is optimized for areas that require regular operation, while mobile type is suitable for sites that need rapid and flexible deployment.

stream_page.description:
Web software for integrated control of drone stations, managing drones and stations,
allowing user permission management, mission creation, and periodic flights through schedule creation.
Supports real-time monitoring of captured videos and data, as well as management and analysis of collected data.
stream_page.tag_title: Key Features of DFOS STREAMING VIEWER

tags.monthly: Display Drone Information and Drone List

stream_page.slider_description: A multi-streaming viewer that allows convenient playback of multiple drone video sources

now.title: Real-time Streaming Support
items: Check real-time drone streaming videos without installing separate programs. Easily accessible via web-based platform across various user environments, enabling quick remote monitoring as needed.

mark.title: Real-time Flight Information Display
items: Integrated with DFOS Station to monitor the status and location of active stations and flying drones in real-time, allowing easy operation to view live streaming of drone-captured videos.

various.title: Support for Various Devices and Layouts
items: Divided into various layouts according to the number of devices (station, drone, CCTV), allowing convenient use with simple user operations.

optimize.title: Optimized Video Support
items: Supports stable playback of multiple streaming videos, and responds to various display methods through full-screen mode and split-screen mode switching functions. Effectively utilized in integrated control center environments such as comprehensive situation rooms and information centers.
